data.text: @candypalladino That’s very kind of you to say, thank you.😬🎬🎬
@thechriswatt Day by day! Keep getting better and keep on writing!
@AlbaBrunetti Cheers Alba. Still a little weary, but feeling much better 👌
@thechriswatt I completely concur on all points! And I hope this means you're feeling a whole lot better too.
@AlbaBrunetti I love that saying, by the way. Beautiful stuff, right back at you ✊
@AlbaBrunetti I’m quite particular with horror, it has to be grounded in character, rather than the concept. But it’s good to move out of your comfort zone every now and again.

@thechriswatt Kolay gelsin, as the Turkish people say. May the work come easy to your hands! It's good that you're switching things up! Romcoms are awesome. (I'm way too freaked out by horror films, unfortunately. ☹️)

@AlbaBrunetti Thanks Alba! Looking forward to getting stuck into writing this, next week. I have a rough first act already written, but had to get this breakdown done, as the 2nd and 3rd acts are really specific. Going to be a hard horror piece. 

Will do a romantic comedy next 😂
